Package org.skistation.services

Class LiftPassService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.LiftPassService
@Service public class LiftPassService extends Object
Represents a lift pass service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the lift pass table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    LiftPassService(LiftPassRepository liftPassRepository, LiftService liftService, PassService passService, LiftTicketRepository liftTicketRepository)
    Constructs a new lift pass service with the specified lift pass repository, lift service, and pass service.

      liftPassRepository - the lift pass repository to perform operations on the lift pass table in the database
      liftService - the lift service to perform operations on the lift table in the database
      passService - the pass service to perform operations on the pass table in the database
